1.  Make a plot of latitude versus longitude for the quakes data in base R. 



2. Make the points filled in circles


3. Color the figure by the number of stations reporting (hint use the `cut2` function). 



4. Make the axis labels "Latitude" and "Longitude"


5. Make the axis labels and ticks larger

6. Add the title "Spatial Distribution of Stations"


7. Add a legend showing the coloring


8. Add a title to the legend
